trans-unit.source: Added Office 2007 mime types to the mime.types file, which was copied from Apache ages ago. The current version of Apache doesn’t contain those yet, nor does the shared-mime-info. Care must be taken when this file is updated again to make sure those mime types are not removed accidentally. [sidnei]
trans-unit.target: Added Office 2007 mime types to the mime.types file, which was copied from Apache ages ago. The current version of Apache doesn’t contain those yet, nor does the shared-mime-info. Care must be taken when this file is updated again to make sure those mime types are not removed accidentally. [sidnei]

trans-unit.source: Added support for real globs, using fnmatch.translate and re.compile and a migration function that will be run from Plone 2.1.1 migration, with some tests specific for globs read from shared-mime-info. [dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up major parts of PT by removing the python only implementation which was broken anyway [tiran]
trans-unit.target: とにかく壊れていたpythonのみの実装を削除することで、PTの主要部分をクリーンアップしました。

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up package metadata and general code. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: パッケージのメタデータと一般的なコードをクリーンアップしました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Cleanup: isort, autopep8, utf8 headers, manual cleanup, security decorators. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: クリーンアップ:isort,autopep8,utf8ヘッダ,マニュアルクリーンアップ,セキュリティデコレータ。[jensens]

trans-unit.source: Compile the 750KiB freedesktop.org.xml file to a binary format which gets loaded on Zope startup instead of reparsing the XML file each time. If the modification time of the source xml file changes, the binary file is automatically recreated. If the binary file cannot be created the xml file is reparsed each time as before. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 750KiBのfreedesktop.org.xmlファイルをバイナリ形式にコンパイルします。ソースのxmlファイルの修正時間が変更された場合、バイナリファイルは自動的に再作成されます。バイナリファイルが作成できなかった場合は、以前と同様に毎回XMLファイルを再解析します。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Convert import step to be registered in ZCML partially fixing #8350 [kiorky]
trans-unit.target: インポートステップをZCMLに登録するように変換し、#8350を部分的に修正した [kiorky]

trans-unit.source: Converted usage of zLOG to new Python logging module. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: zLOGの使用法を新しいPythonロギングモジュールに変換しました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: The side-effect of this is that in unix, the Python ‘mimetypes’ module would happily read ‘/etc/mime.types’ and gracefully work (/etc/mime.types has most of the extensions of shared-mime-info but a few), where on Windows it would fail to detect mimetypes by extension. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: The side-effect of this is that in unix, the Python ‘mimetypes’ module would happily read ‘/etc/mime.types’ and gracefully work (/etc/mime.types has most of the extensions of shared-mime-info but a few), where on Windows it would fail to detect mimetypes by extension. [dreamcatcher]
